text: @realDonaldTrump Your #StayAtHome plan is working to save lives but the Economic Impact Payments for #Coronavirus is not enough to allow people to #StayHome , we need a second round of #stimuluspayment ASAP, and a long term #StimulusPlan. #StimulusBill to beat #COVID19 @PressSec  @POTUS
